summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 204 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 921 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 204.0m lower than yesterday, 42.5m lower than the past week, 920.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 745m and a high of 3580m, averaging 1782.4m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Rain showers likely, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
